subtitle: On the Day
text: As there will be no ceremony, the celebrations will begin in the garden of Updown at 3pm with cocktails and lighter bites followed by a meal in the conservatory.

subtitle: Dresscode
text: There’s no formal dresscode. Wear whatever’s your fanciest or what you are happy to wear. If the weather allows we hope to spend some of the afternoon in the garden – so a jumper or light jacket might come in handy – but the meal will be held in the heated conservatory.

subtitle: How to Get to Updown
text: If you’re arriving by car, there is parking at the venue. If you’re traveling through London, you can take a Southeastern train from Stratford, St Pancras or Victoria and then a bus from Walmer or Dover – which should be about a two and a half hour journey in total. For more detailed directions, click here.

subtitle: Where to Stay
text: There are limited options for nearby stays. The Crown Inn at Finglesham and The Five Bells in Eastry offer rooms and are located five minutes away from Updown by car. There are also a selection of Airbnbs in the area. For recommendations further afield, have a look here.

subtitle: Gifts
text: We appreciate you travelling to celebrate with us – so your presence is the only present desired!

subtitle: Speeches
text: If you’d like to say a few words or host a toast, you can let Johanna know at johanna_jonson@hotmail.com and we'll fit you in!
